title: Miscellaneous / Intro & Outro
description: Covers all non-recipe content such as video greetings, channel promotions, personal stories, thanks messages, like/share/subscribe prompts, and other commentary unrelated to cooking instructions.

ingredients: Onion peel (visible on the white plate)

actions: Pouring sauce onto the plate with oil
Placing onion peel on the plate
Lifting the pan away after pouring the sauce
utensils: White ceramic plate with decorative edge

Rectangular dark slate board (background, holds vegetables)

Whole spices, possibly including cumin seeds and cardamom pods
actions: Holding the pot with dried mango slices
Adding whole spices into the pot
Requesting viewers to subscribe to the channel (indicated by the on-screen prompt)
utensils: Stainless steel pot with a metallic heating plate

ingredients: Spiced mixture (contains visible spices such as red and brown spices)
actions: Adding drops of sweet essence to the spiced mixture
Stirring the spiced mixture
Holding the container with the spiced mixture
Drizzling the spiced mixture over cooked rice
utensils: Container with a handle (used to hold the spiced mixture)
